data.name: Quadrilateral Cowboy
data.detailed_description:
Hacking. Dial tone. Cassette decks. Sabotage. Suitcase decks. Brainbox injectors.

Quadrilateral Cowboy is a single-player adventure in a cyberpunk world. Tread lightly through security systems with your hacking deck and grey-market equipment. With top-of-the-line hardware like this, it means just one thing: you answer only to the highest bidder.

The Standard Edition includes:

  • Quadrilateral Cowboy.
  • Developer Commentary.
  • Reference Manual.

The Deluxe Edition includes:

  • Everything In the Standard Edition.
  • Quadrilateral Cowboy interactive art book.
  • PDFs for box art, poster, and papercraft characters.
data.about_the_game:
Hacking. Dial tone. Cassette decks. Sabotage. Suitcase decks. Brainbox injectors.

Quadrilateral Cowboy is a single-player adventure in a cyberpunk world. Tread lightly through security systems with your hacking deck and grey-market equipment. With top-of-the-line hardware like this, it means just one thing: you answer only to the highest bidder.

data.short_description: When you have a top-of-the-line hacking deck armed with a 56.6k modem and a staggering 256k RAM, it means just one thing: you answer only to the highest bidder.
data.reviews:
“Like Gravity Bone and Thirty Flights of Loving before it, this is a game that cannot be missed by fans of the medium.”
8/10 – Destructoid

“Quadrilateral Cowboy is a strange, fantastic journey that will likely charm and test you in equal measure.”
9.5/10 – Game Informer

“The other side to Quadrilateral Cowboy's coin, the quiet moments between the missions, are just as strong as its heists.”
9/10 – Gamespot

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 and above
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9800 GT or ATI Radeon HD 5750, 1 GB video RAM
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.9 Mavericks or newer
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA or ATI GPU, 1 GB video RAM
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: glibc 2.17+, 64-bit only
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9800 GT or ATI Radeon HD 5750, 1 GB video RAM
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
